Professor Sedgwick is

heading to North Wales

on a field trip to research old rock formations. I’ll put in

a good word for you and

see if you can join him.

Really?

I knew you’d be interested.

Ha ha ha!

Darwin joined Professor Sedgwick

on his geology investigation to North Wales,

visiting areas including Llangollen, Conway,

Bangor and Capel Curig.

Come along with me.

You can collect the
rock samples and mark

the geological layers on

the map.

Yes, Professor.

Like this?

Yes, great job!

Take a look. There might even be fossils inside.

Fossils!

47
